name: Quest for Pickles
description:
An old half-dead zombie grandpa sends his granddaughter to the cellar for pickles. The door slams shut, the grandpa can't hear one's screams, and the girl is left alone with a pixel 2D platformer and cans of salted tomatoes that she still has to find.

Cover Image: @simalacrum

Assetpack: slightly edited microfantasy by 0x72

SFX: undertale
